name: CONSORZIO PER LA TUTELA DEL FORMAGGIO PECORINO ROMANO
description: The consortium that oversees and regulates all registered production of Pecornio Romano.
sampleDescriptions: Representation of Consorzio per la Tutela del Formaggio Pecorino Romano before the Office of the United States Trade Representative on trade issues.
Tariffs on imported items from Italy.
